C:/Users/Deepak/Projects/EvolveNetworks/simulation/cvodesim.h

00001 /*****************************************************************
00002 
00003 A wrapper for the Sundials CVODE numerical integration library
00004 The wrapper is only for initial value problems. 
00005 Each wrapper functions have two versions: 
00006         one that accepts a function with differential equation definitions
00007         one that accepts a stoichiometry matrix and a propensity function
00008 The wrapper provides support for event functions and user defined structs as parameter.
00009 
00010 ****************************************************************/
00011 
00012 #include <stdio.h>
00013 #include <stdlib.h>
00014 #include <math.h>

00017 #define GA_CVODE_WRAPPER_FILE
00018 
00019 #include <cvode/cvode.h>             /* prototypes for CVODE fcts. and consts. */
00020 #include <nvector/nvector_serial.h>  /* serial N_Vector types, fcts., and macros */
00021 #include <sundials/sundials_band.h>  /* definitions of type BandMat and macros */
00022 #include <sundials/sundials_types.h> /* definition of type realtype */
00023 #include <sundials/sundials_math.h>  /* definition of ABS and EXP */
00024 //#include "mathfunc.h"   /*eigenvalue computation */

00026 #define SUNDIALS_DOUBLE_PRECISION 1
